original_text: And let us not grow weary of doing good, for in due season we will reap, if we do not give up.
korean_text: 우리가 선을 행하되 낙심하지 말지니 포기하지 아니하면 때가 이르매 거두리라

sentences.original_text: And let us not grow weary of doing good
for in due season we will reap
sentences.korean_translation: 때가 되면 우리는 거두게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: if we do not give up
